Nemesis Enforcer/Breakdown/Hiss:


Nemesis Enforcer stepped on a branch, snapping it in half, 20 feet behind 
Zardus and co.  "Zardus, we have arrived!" Nemesis shouted, chuckling to 
himself.

Breakdown and Hiss came from the front, weapons raised.
"What is the point of this, if you'd be so kind to tell us." Breakdown said 
mockingly.
